column5: Hi Guys, im new to Brockville, and am looking for a fishing partner. I have a newer boat and fish the St.Lawrence for walley and Musky, getting to know the area pretty good just want a extra guy in the boat to help me learn the area better.
I'm no where near you ! But welcome to the board.

Howdy.  My cottage is only 6 miles from you .... of course there is this little thing between us called a National Border (and a giant river).  I fish the river out front of Brockville quite a bit.  I'm sure there are better stretches to fish, but I do fine.  I love the big shoals that are out there as well as the deep water humps.  I usually come up once or twice a year to fish for a few days by myself.  I'll give you a shout next time I'm up there.
Welcome...   I'm a good ways easy of you but I fish walleye and musky on the st lawrence...  This river has lots to offer...
Thanks guys I fish the river down by gananoque in the fall thanks for the feedback again if anyone wants a spot in the boat let me know
Welcome. I may give you a call... That is if I can get Habs play off tickets
